about.title: About Craftify Tech
about.subtitle: Craftify Tech delivers specialized cybersecurity expertise – accessible, measurable, and tailored. We unite top specialists to defend, optimize, and evolve your digital security environment.
about.itemText2: Deliver targeted, actionable security solutions that adapt to evolving threats and align with your operational and governance needs.
about.itemText3: Proven track record in enterprise-grade security integration

homeHero.label: [Expert-Driven]
homeHero.title: Cybersecurity
homeHero.subtitle: Integration for Business
homeHero.text: Craftify Tech connects your company with the precise skills, technologies, and frameworks needed to solve complex cybersecurity challenges — from architecture to operations.

ourApproach.itemText1: We evaluate your infrastructure, workflows, and governance posture to pinpoint risk and complexity.
ourApproach.itemText2: We bring in domain specialists – architects, engineers, analysts – matched precisely to your challenge.
ourApproach.itemText3: We align people, processes, and technology into a unified, resilient security architecture.
ourApproach.itemText4: We measure outcomes against recognized frameworks to ensure lasting compliance and performance.
ourApproach.title: Our Approach
ourApproach.text: We don’t sell predefined packages — we assemble the exact expertise your case demands.

ourExpertise.itemText1: Ensure secure, uninterrupted operations across hybrid and cloud infrastructures.
ourExpertise.itemText2: Gain full control over user access, authentication, and permissions across your systems.
ourExpertise.itemText3: Detect incidents early, respond fast, and minimize operational disruption.
ourExpertise.itemText4: Build a unified security structure that adapts as your business evolves.
ourExpertise.itemText5: Meet and maintain alignment with regulatory frameworks – without slowing operations.
ourExpertise.itemText6: Keep every device, network layer, and workload shielded from modern threats.
ourExpertise.title: Our Expertise
ourExpertise.text: Comprehensive coverage across all key cybersecurity domains.

secure.title: Secure Your Enterprise Infrastructure, Talk to a Cyber Expert Today

tech.title: Craftify Tech
tech.text: Practical expertise that strengthens resilience, compliance, and operational continuity.

theChallenge.title: The Challenge
theChallenge.subtitle: Cybersecurity isn’t just about defense — it’s about coordination. That’s where most systems fail.
theChallenge.text: Fragmented systems, overwhelmed teams, and constantly shifting regulations leave critical gaps exposed. Even strong internal departments can’t cover every domain or adapt fast enough.
theChallenge.item-4: Absence of niche expertise when it matters most

homepage.title: Not a vendor
homepage.subtitle: A cybersecurity command unit built around your needs.

aboutExperts.title: Our Experts Are
aboutExperts.subtitle: Ready to Consult You Right Away
aboutExperts.text: Schedule a session or emergency advisory call within 24 hours for pressing security needs: SOC assessment, incident response, or architecture review.

aboutPricing.itemText1: Full process management to achieve defined goals.
aboutPricing.itemText2: Senior specialists coordinated under one oversight.
aboutPricing.itemText5: EU-aligned processes ensure accountability and clarity.
aboutPricing.title: Pricing Philosophy
aboutPricing.text:
Craftify Tech rates reflect the value of structured delivery, expert coordination, and measurable results – not just hours or headcount.
Every engagement ensures that enterprise cybersecurity work is executed efficiently, with accountability and clarity.

aboutWho.title: Who We Are
aboutWho.subtitle: Craftity Labs is a cybersecurity integrator with deep operational expertise, delivering enterprise-grade security by orchestrating vetted specialists across multiple domains.

teamExperts.itemText1: Designs secure cloud infrastructures, implements Zero Trust principles, and ensures compliance with enterprise resilience standards.
teamExperts.itemText2: Coordinates containment, eradication, and recovery during critical incidents with minimal operational disruption.
teamExperts.itemText3: Implements ISO, PCI, and GDPR frameworks, ensuring measurable governance and audit readiness.
teamExperts.itemText4: Conducts adversary simulations and penetration testing to expose and mitigate critical vulnerabilities.
teamExperts.itemText5: Integrates security into CI/CD pipelines, maintaining code integrity and continuous protection.
teamExperts.title: Experts Who Power Our Projects

howWeChoose.text1: Minimum 7 years in cybersecurity operations, architecture, or threat response.
howWeChoose.text2: OSCP, CISSP, AWS Security Pro, ISO Auditor, or equivalent.
howWeChoose.text3: 3-stage review — technical test, peer validation, project performance check.
howWeChoose.text5: Network grows only with fully vetted, domain-matched experts.
howWeChoose.title:
How We
Choose Our Experts
howWeChoose.subtitle: Only Proven Specialists Make the Cut

teamApproach.itemText1: Full operational control and unified reporting
teamApproach.itemText2: Every task handled by the right certified specialist
teamApproach.itemText3: Add or replace experts within days
teamApproach.itemText4: Oversight by senior architects or vCISOs
teamApproach.title: Our Approach
teamApproach.subtitle: Most organizations cannot maintain full in-house cybersecurity coverage.
teamApproach.text:
Craftify Tech builds and manages dedicated expert teams for every security
domain – led, coordinated, and quality-controlled by our core management unit.
teamApproach.resultsText: Сomplete security capability without building an internal department.

teamDetails.text1: Gaps between tools, teams, and processes.
teamDetails.text4: One overloaded expert can’t sustain enterprise resilience.
teamDetails.title: of Companies Hire One IT Person to “Handle Security.”
teamDetails.subtitle: Here’s Why It Fails.
teamDetails.text:
Modern cybersecurity spans 12+ specialized domains.
No single person can manage network defense, DevSecOps,
incident response, compliance, and AI/data security — all at once.

teampage.title: Not a vendor
teampage.subtitle: A cybersecurity command unit built around your needs.

integratorAssurance.itemText1: Every specialist we engage has a minimum of seven years of hands-on experience across their domain.
integratorAssurance.itemText2: Experts meet strict certification requirements (OSCP, CISSP, AWS Security Pro, ISO Auditor, or equivalent).
integratorAssurance.itemText3: Each expert passes a three-stage review: technical validation, peer assessment, and project performance check.
integratorAssurance.itemText4: Senior architects continuously monitor delivery quality to ensure standards remain high across all engagements.
integratorAssurance.title: Assurance & Standards
integratorAssurance.text: We ensure every engagement meets the highest standards from day one:

integratorExpect.text1: One person coordinates planning, progress, and reporting.
integratorExpect.text2: Scoping call, prioritized tasks, and required access outlined.
integratorExpect.title: What to Expect

integratorExperts.title: Our Experts Are Ready to Consult You Right Away
integratorExperts.subtitle: Schedule a session or emergency advisory call within 24 hours for pressing security needs: SOC assessment, incident response, or architecture review.

integratorHero.title2: Multiple Experts, Single Accountability, Proven Results

integratorInPractice.itemText1: We define your security goals and KPIs based on your operational context.
integratorInPractice.itemText2: Certified specialists are assigned per domain to cover every critical area.
integratorInPractice.itemText3: A single delivery manager coordinates all activities and reporting.
integratorInPractice.itemText4: Results are measured against KPIs and used to improve your next steps.
integratorInPractice.title: How the Integrator Model Works in Practice
integratorInPractice.text: Other solutions leave gaps. We cover every domain with one tailored team.
integratorInPractice.resultsText: Enterprise cybersecurity, measurable results, zero in-house overhead

integratorOperate.itemText1: Senior architects and delivery leads oversee project scope, timelines, and quality.
integratorOperate.itemText2: Verified specialists across all cybersecurity domains engaged per project scope.
integratorOperate.itemText3: Each engagement runs under defined SLAs, with integrations and runbooks ensuring continuity.
integratorOperate.itemText4: Every activity documented with evidence, progress checkpoints, and audit-ready summaries.
integratorOperate.title: What We Operate

integratorSecond.title: Struggling to turn cybersecurity spending into real resilience?
integratorSecond.subtitle: The Integrator Model achieves enterprise-grade protection through structured, accountable delivery.
integratorSecond.subtitle2: That’s how we do it – through the Integrator Model
integratorSecond.item-1-text: One contract, one delivery lead, unified reporting.
integratorSecond.item-2-text: Certified experts assigned per scope and sector.
integratorSecond.item-3-text: Each engagement tied to KPIs and governance checks.

integratorWays.title: Two Delivery Ways
integratorWays.subtitle: Craftify Tech operates under two delivery models to match your needs.
integratorWays.col1Item1: Outcome-focused: audits, pentests, designs, simulations, assessments
integratorWays.col1Item2: Scoped deliverables with KPIs and acceptance window
integratorWays.col1Item3: Ideal for defined results: hardened systems, validated controls, or audit evidence
integratorWays.col12tem1: Continuous operations, monitoring, or advisory under monthly agreement
integratorWays.col2Item2: Continuous operations, monitoring, or advisory under monthly agreement
integratorWays.col3Item3: Continuous operations, monitoring, or advisory under monthly agreement

integratorWhy.text1: Expert teams deployed within days, not months.
integratorWhy.text2: Single point of accountability eliminates gaps and miscommunication.
integratorWhy.text3: Every engagement tied to measurable KPIs and governance checkpoints.
